data.text: @ManuSaunders @tasbiophiliac Agree Manu. And it was definitely not ranting, and no need for an apology. I loved hearing the evolution of the book and I know it's going to be strongly snapped up!
@tasbiophiliac @PerpetuaTurner No such thing as beautiful books you don't need!

@PerpetuaTurner @ManuSaunders Hah! Sorry for ranting at you Pep! And yes - we are truly in a golden age of kids non fiction - I struggle every time I go into a bookshop not to buy beautiful books that I probably donâ€™t need!🦉🪲🦋🐴🐺🦇🐥🐍📚
